augmentedStrong.references: Matt.25.39 Matt.25.43 Matt.25.44 Luke.10.9 Luke.9.2 Acts.5.15 Acts.5.16

vocabinfos.lsjDefs:
ἀσθεν-ής, ές,
without strength, weak,
__1 in body, feeble, sickly, τοὺς ἀσθενέας τῆς στρατιῆς[Refs 5th c.BC+]; τοὺς ἀσθενεστάτους ἐς τὰς ταλαιπωρίας least able to bear hardship, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; ἀσθενέστερος πόνον ἐνεγκεῖν too weak to.., [Refs 4th c.BC+]. adverb ἀσθενῶς, ἴσχειν[Refs 5th c.BC+]
__2 in mind, and the like, τὸ ἀ. τῆς γνώμης the weakness, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__3 in power, weak, feeble, ἀ. δύναμις[Refs 5th c.BC+]
__4 in property, weak, poor, οἱ χρήμασιν ἀσθενέστεροι[Refs 5th c.BC+]; οἱ ἀσθενέστεροι the weaker sort, i.e. the poor, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__5 insignificant, οὐκ ἀσθενέστατος σοφιστὴς Ἑλλήνων[Refs 5th c.BC+]; paltry, ἀ. σόφισμα[Refs 4th c.BC+]; of streams, petty, small, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; of fluids, of small specific gravity, [Refs]; ἐς ἀσθενὲς ἔρχεται comes to nothing, [Refs]. adverb -νῶς feebly, without energy, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; on slight evidence, ἀπαγγέλλεσθαι[Refs 1st c.AD+]Praef.: comparative ἀσθενεστέρως, ἐπιθυμεῖν[Refs 5th c.BC+] -έστερον [Refs] -έστερα [Refs 5th c.BC+]

vocabinfos.shortDef:
: weak/disabled
weak, ill (of physical weakness or illness, also of moral or spiritual weakness)
vocabinfos.mediumDef:
weak, ill (of physical weakness or illness, also of moral or spiritual weakness)
without strength, weak, infirm, Mt. 26:41; Mk. 14:38; 1Pet. 3:7; helpless, Rom. 5:6; imperfect, inefficient, Gal. 4:9; feeble, without energy, 2Cor. 10:10; infirm in body, sick, sickly, ill Mt. 25:39, 43, 44; weak, mentally or spiritually, dubious, hesitating, 1Cor. 8:7, 10; 9:22; 1Thess. 5:14; afflicted, distressed, oppressed with calamities, 1Cor. 4:10
vocabinfos._es_Definition: enfermo ; débil ; delicado (de partes del cuerpo) ; incapaz (de salvarse) (ROM.5:6)
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 生病的
2) 軟弱的
2a) 身體上的
2b) 外在或內裡的柔弱, 沒有效果
2c) 信仰與德性的軟弱無助
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
1) 生病的
2) 软弱的
2a) 身体上的
2b) 外在或内里的柔弱, 没有效果
2c) 信仰与德性的软弱无助
vocabinfos._vi_Definition: yếu đau; yếu đuối, bệnh tật

vocabinfos.shortDef:
: ill
weak, ill (of physical weakness or illness, also of moral or spiritual weakness)
